section_title: SBSTA Workshop on the Development of Early Warning Systems and Contingency Plans in Relation to Extreme Weather Events and Its Effects Such as Desertification, Drought, Floods, Landslides, Storm Surge, Soil Erosion, and Saline Water Intrusion
sentences: This event took place on Tuesday, 2 June.
A summary of discussions is available at: http://www.iisd.ca/vol12/enb12630e.html
